title: Blessed Bru
content: RIBBON CUTTING – On May 24, the Bridgeport Chamber of Commerce held a ribbon cutting for Blessed Bru. Pictured (from left) are Gabriella Cramton, David Cramton, Jocelyn Cramton, Maxwell Cramton and Jude Cramton. Messenger photo by Laura Belcher    LOCATION: 1020 Hasell St. in Bridgeport    PHONE NUMBER: 940-393-1738    WEBSITE:  blessedbru.com    HOURS: 8 a.m. to 2 p.m. Tuesday through Friday; 6 to 9 p.m. Thursday evenings; 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. Saturday; closed Sunday and Monday    OWNER/MANAGEMENT: Jocelyn Cramton and David Cramton    PRODUCTS/SERVICES: Coffee, tea, baked goods
contentWithMarkup:
RIBBON CUTTING – On May 24, the Bridgeport Chamber of Commerce held a ribbon cutting for Blessed Bru. Pictured (from left) are Gabriella Cramton, David Cramton, Jocelyn Cramton, Maxwell Cramton and Jude Cramton. Messenger photo by Laura Belcher

LOCATION: 1020 Hasell St. in Bridgeport

PHONE NUMBER: 940-393-1738

WEBSITE: blessedbru.com

HOURS: 8 a.m. to 2 p.m. Tuesday through Friday; 6 to 9 p.m. Thursday evenings; 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. Saturday; closed Sunday and Monday

OWNER/MANAGEMENT: Jocelyn Cramton and David Cramton

PRODUCTS/SERVICES: Coffee, tea, baked goods
